name: Daffodils.pk3
description:
Daffodils - its a single pk3 level made in 5 days. Practing with a basics gzdoom feature

IWAD- doom2.wad or freedoom.wad Source port - GZDoom 4.4.2 or higher May not run - Eternity engine, ZDoom, PRBoom+,DSDA doom.

Why GZDoom? Because its most simple and advanced source port, and its free!

Credits:

Thanks to Dragonfly for the beautiful playpal (or the color map)

Textures - gothic2dm,OTEX,doom 64.

Daffodils petals - Toby Fox(love you <3)

Revolver decorate file - Batandy

Skybox - Ukiro (from OTEX texture)
